channel.title: CVE Feed for Team Heateor -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Team Heateor -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29804|2024-03-27T12:16:30.332Z -- Team Heateor -- Fancy Comments WordPress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Team Heateor Fancy Comments WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Fancy Comments WordPress: from n/a through 1.2.14.

item.title: CVE-2024-24712|2024-02-10T08:05:29.864Z -- Team Heateor -- Heateor Social Login WordPress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Team Heateor Heateor Social Login WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Heateor Social Login WordPress: from n/a through 1.1.30.
